GapShuffler<T> - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.cringe
Meant to take a fixed-size set of items and produce a shuffled stream of them such that an element is never chosen in quick succession; that is, there should always be a gap between the same item's occurrences.

Reads in a CharSequence containing only hex digits (only 0-9, a-f, and A-F) with an optional sign at the start and returns the long they represent, reading at most 16 characters (17 if there is a sign) and returning the result if valid, or 0 if nothing could be read.

rotateStep(long, float[], int) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.RotationSupport
This is just part of a larger rotation generator; it takes a target size (the side length of the matrix this will return), another matrix small (with a side length 1 less than targetSize), and a random number seed, and uses the seed and some matrix operations to generate a random rotation based on small.

scrambleGaussian(long) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x, this randomly scrambles x to get a pseudo-random double with a Gaussian distribution (a "bell curve" distribution centered on 0.0 with standard deviation 1.0).

scrambleLong(long, long, long) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x and a bound as two longs, this randomly scrambles x and returns a pseudorandom, uniformly distributed long value between the specified inner bound (inclusive) and the specified outer bound (exclusive).
Scramblers - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.cringe
Static methods that can take any long as input and produce a very different, but deterministically chosen, number of some type.

splineWobbleAngle(float, int) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.LineWobble
Like LineWobble.splineWobble(float, int), this is a 1D wobble that can become more sharp or more gradual at different points on its length, but this produces a (wrapping) angle measured in radians.

WARP - Static variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.ContinuousNoise
Layered octaves of noise, where each octave has a different frequency and weight, and the results of earlier octaves affect the inputs to later octave calculations.
WeightedTable - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.cringe
A form of probability table, this stores indices into some external Array or other ordered sequence and weights that determine how much to favor producing a given index.

A type of 1D noise that takes an int seed and is optimized for usage on GWT.
wobbleAngle(float, int) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.LineWobble
A 1D "noise" method that produces smooth transitions like a sine wave, but also wrapping around at pi * 2 so this can be used to get smoothly-changing random angles.
wobbleAngleDeg(float, int) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.LineWobble
A 1D "noise" method that produces smooth transitions like a sine wave, but also wrapping around at 360.0 so this can be used to get smoothly-changing random angles.
wobbleAngleTurns(float, int) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.LineWobble
A 1D "noise" method that produces smooth transitions like a sine wave, but also wrapping around at 1.0 so this can be used to get smoothly-changing random angles in turns.
